meanings.definition: Not supported by another structure; standing alone
meanings.sent1: The freestanding statue in the park caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The freestanding bookshelf added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The freestanding umbrella kept moving in the wind, playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: Her freestanding courage in the face of adversity inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The freestanding tree stood tall and proud in the middle of the field.

meanings.definition: Able to be used or placed without being attached to another structure
meanings.sent1: The freestanding mirror was perfect for the small apartment.
meanings.sent2: The freestanding hammock was easy to set up in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The freestanding clock seemed to have a mind of its own, ticking at odd times.
meanings.sent4: His freestanding ideas were innovative and groundbreaking in the industry.
meanings.sent5: The freestanding microwave saved space in the kitchen, making cooking more convenient.
